attributes.action: remove the tradition that the Speaker of the house is returned unopposed in his constituency
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is a disgusting infringement of rights that voters in the Speakers constituency are disenfranchised by the major political parties failure to enter candidates in opposition to his re-election.  The Speaker should under no circumstances be above the wishes of the people and should stand for re-election under exactly the same conditions as all other MPs.

rejection.details: This is a convention maintained by the various political parties, so this is a matter for direct communication with them.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
